Sharing Stories

HTH Astronomy Club & Semester Upstream

My Role and what we're doing today

Recording 2-3m stories from the HTH Astronomy Club and Semester Upstream about you and how you've changed.

Examples...

Since semester upstream...

  • How has your community changed?
  • How did camping change you and your connection to nature?
  • How did you make a soundtrack and what did that experience teach you?
  • How do you think differently now about water and the Colorado River.

What makes a good story?

Taking someone with you to a place

  1. Anecdotes
  2. Feeling
  3. Pacing
  4. A Hook

The Power of the Anecdote

What gives this a feeling?

Pacing

A Good Hook

Link: The Apartment, TAL 233

What makes the prologue good/funny?

Examples of Project Stories

Showing your creative process

Talking about failing for a while...

Sharing an idea that changes the way you see the world

Share a story about yourself

+ Sem. Upstream or Astronomy Club that may show...

  • The arc of how you/your skills developed over time
  • How an experienced changed you and the way you see the world
  • Something you made and the process of making it
  • Something else entirely

Process of recording the story

  • Connect mic to phone
  • Go to conference or sound room
  • Record a 2-3m story (remember we can edit and splice, do it doesn't have to be perfect!)
